aircraft.value: Atlas Cargo - AC-2090-192 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Reservoir fluid level sensor failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 11/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 14/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 15/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 14/11/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 19/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

Part - III: (Defect Details)

Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
